name: Turbak
text:
...It's fine.
Because, you see, I wished for it.
This dream that's enveloping me—

name: Turbak
text:
That these people are sad,
that they hate the world, that they resent it.
That they want to erase everything.

name: Turbak
text:
I want to properly share
those kinds of feelings too.
...So, I'll take it all.

His face swallowed, his expression unseen.
But even so, Turbak still laughs.
And then—

name: Turbak
text:
...This is fine, right?
I was a good boy until the end...
I made everyone happy, right...?

With those quiet, muttered words,
Turbak is completely swallowed,
and silence envelops the area.

options.text: I won't let you leave my sight!

text:
The form of the dream that the Imposter Villain wore.
It's an emotion so intense, it's capable of
overwriting Turbak's own sense of self.

[Player] follows the thread connecting
themself and the fading Turbak,
and sharpens their senses.

options.text: It should be the same as last time.

text:
And so, [Player] observes
Turbak's memories flowing in
through the thread.

name: Boy's Voice
text:
Wow!
There are so many bonfires!
It's beautiful, Dad!!

name: Father's Voice
text:
Yes, today is a day to be grateful for
the connection between us humans and this land,
and to carve it into our memories.

name: Father's Voice
text:
It's not just a festival for you.
Watch carefully the ceremony
I'm about to perform.

name: Father's Voice
text:
What I inherited from my father, and what
my father inherited from his father.
From a time so long ago, it's been passed down and preserved.

name: Father's Voice
text:
Someday, you will inherit it.
And you, in turn, will pass it down
to someone else. Understood?

name: Boy's Voice
text:
I'll inherit it from you, Dad,
and I'll pass it down to someone else...
Hmm, I don't really get it, but okay!

name: Father's Voice
text:
Haha, that's fine for now.
The day will come when you understand.
You're a good boy, Turbak.

name: Father's Voice
text:
Now, it's time for the ceremony.
When it's over, let's enjoy the festival together.

name: Turbak
text:
Yay! I want the skewered meat from the stall...
No, I have to study the ceremony first!
I'm going to be just like you, Dad!

That day, I still remember
it vividly.

The flames of the bonfires floating in the darkness,
the voices of people echoing in the distance, and—

The precious warmth transmitted
from that slightly bony hand.

name: Turbak
text:
...I could never forget it, no.
Because, for me, that was
everything that I had.

A vast grassland, high mountains.
And a deep, spreading forest.
That was my entire world.

To outsiders, it might have looked
like a poor life, but we lived as
one with nature, with the star.

In that small world,
my father fulfilled the role of a ritualist,
connecting the star and the people.

And then, it was decided from the time
I was born that I would succeed him.

name: Father's Voice
text:
Be righteous, Turbak.
A ritualist is an important role that
connects the star and the people.

name: Village Resident
text:
Oh, Turbak-kun, you're such a good boy!
Just as expected from our future ritualist!

name: Village Child
text:
You're training to be a ritualist every day, right?
Turbak, you're so amazing,
so different from us!

name: Turbak
text:
I was told that every day since I was a kid.
To be a person worthy of being a ritualist.

name: Turbak
text:
Be kind to everyone, never stop smiling.
Always be close to people,
and share their pain.

name: Turbak
text:
That it was my role
to lead many people
to a happy future.

name: Turbak
text:
...That was my pride,
and my everything.

...My everything, it was.
And then it was gone.

One day, a survey team
from another star apparently
found a vein of rare ore.

The news spread instantly
to the neighboring stars...
And many people immigrated.

And then, in just 10 years.
The deep forests disappeared, and the vast
grasslands replaced by mining facilities.

The wide sky I thought
continued to the ends of the world
could only be seen between buildings.

The world has obtained a richer life.
For everyone, the star wasn't something to live with,
it just became the land they lived on.

name: Turbak
text:
But still, I believed.
...No, I wanted to believe.
No matter how much the world changed—

name: Turbak
text:
The people here wouldn't change.
That the customs we've passed down, the feelings
we've connected to the star wouldn't just disappear.

name: Village Resident
text:
I heard they're attracting a big hospital!
Now we can raise our children
without any worries.

name: Village Resident
text:
It was a good idea to leave it to the foreign mayor.
He invested the money from mining back into the town,
and turned this into the star's central city.

name: Father's Voice
text:
...That's certainly wonderful.
By the way, about this year's festival...

name: Village Resident
text:
Ah... About that.
Maybe it's about time
we stopped that festival?

name: Village Resident
text:
We don't have a place to hold it, anyway.
Kids these days wouldn't want to participate
in 'ritual-like' things like that.

name: Village Resident
text:
Even without a festival, we're
still grateful to the star, you know?
Is that not good enough?

name: Father's Voice
text:
...I see.
Thank you for everything,
I'm sorry to have troubled you.

name: Turbak's Father
text:
The role of the ritualist ends here.
...I wasn't able to pass down
to you what I've inherited myself.

name: Turbak's Father
text:
Even though, you've told me you wanted to take on the role!
I'm truly sorry, Turbak.
Please forgive your worthless father...!

name: Turbak
text:
...Dad.
Don't make that face now,
I'm totally fine with it.

name: Turbak
text:
It's true that this might be sad, but
it is what the people of this city wanted.
That means, it's going to be a happy future!

name: Turbak
text:
Besides, Dad.
I'm not giving up on passing it on to someone.
I'll leave this star, and—

name: Turbak
text:
I'll travel to all sorts of stars,
and I'll pass on what I've inherited
to the people of other stars.

name: Turbak
text:
If it remains in someone's memory, that means
I've passed it on to someone else, right?
I'm sure, that that is my role.

name: Turbak's Father
text:
...I see.
You're really a good boy, Turbak.
Thank you... Thank you...

name: Turbak
text:
W-Wait a minute, Dad!?
We're in the middle of the ritual,
so please wipe your tears!

name: Turbak
text:
...Leave it to me!
I'm sure I can do it.
Because I'm a 'good boy'.

name: Turbak
text:
...Why, did you decide to follow me?
[Player]-kun?

options.text: My body just moved on its own.

name: Turbak
text:
...At times like this,
I suppose I should say thank you.

name: Turbak
text:
...You saw my memories, didn't you?
Hey, was I doing it right?
Was I, a 'good boy' until the end?

Sharing Turbak's memories,
the scene that was visible fades away, and
the surroundings are closed off into darkness.

Turbak stands in the empty darkness with a smile.
That expression, which he had shown all over the moon,
gradually begins to cloud over.

name: Turbak
text:
Since I was born, it was decided
that I would become a ritualist to
connect the star and the people.

name: Turbak
text:
By the time I was old enough to
understand, I was told to be a
'good boy' worthy of being one.

name: Turbak
text:
And, I was so proud of that!
If I was a good boy, everyone smiled,
and said I would become a great ritualist.

name: Turbak
text:
But... In the end, the festival
disappeared from my hometown.
I'll never become a ritualist.

As Turbak says that, he looks down,
and his voice changes to a downcast one.

name: Turbak
text:
Everyone's lives got better, and they smiled more.
That's what's happy for everyone.
—A way of life that doesn't need festivals or ritualists.

name: Turbak
text:
Even my father, who could no longer
live as a ritualist, smiled in the end
when I said I would inherit his will.

name: Turbak
text:
So, I smiled too!
Because, a good boy is supposed to
celebrate everyone's happiness, right?

name: Turbak
text:
Everyone is happy with their new lives,
and Dad is happy that I'm inheriting his role!
Isn't that just great!?

options.text: Turbak-san, you don't have to smile.
You don't have to hold it in.
But then, what about your own happiness?

name: Turbak
text:
I'm not holding anything in.
...I'm supposed to be happy too.
It's like that, right?

name: Turbak
text:
...Should I have told everyone?
That they were irresponsible to raise me to become
a ritualist and then say it's no longer needed?

name: Turbak
text:
Or should I have told my dad?
That he's the one who raised me as a ritualist,
but I'm the one who wants to cry instead!?

name: Turbak
text:
There's no way I could do that!
If I can't be a ritualist or a good boy, then what
was the point of my life up until now!?

name: Turbak
text:
I've been told I'm a good boy all my life,
and I've lived my life to be that way.
Even after becoming a hero, always!

name: Turbak
text:
I...
I don't know any other way to live.
If even that is denied, then I...!!

Various emotions flow into [Player]
through the thread from Turbak.
Anger, sadness... The fear of being denied.

name: Turbak
text:
...Sorry, [Player]-kun.
I, lied to you back there.
While you were closing the attackers' paths—

name: Turbak
text:
It's true that I was taking on the
dream that was overwriting them.
But, it wasn't to help you.

name: Turbak
text:
...I was envious of this emotion.
To be angry, to hate, about something that can't be
helped, and to be able to say it out loud.

name: Turbak
text:
These people were screaming
things I couldn't even imagine.
That's really amazing, isn't it!?

name: Turbak
text:
...This dream is something that hurts people.
I know that much myself,
but—

name: Turbak
text:
I, don't want to deny this dream.
So at least... I want to be together with it.
I want to share the moment it disappears.

Squeezing out the words,
Turbak takes a deep breath.
And, he looks up and smiles broadly.

name: Turbak
text:
...Well, that's all I have to say!
I'm going now, [Player]-kun.

name: Turbak
text:
—Please let me be a good boy until the end,
and let me end as a hero who made everyone happy.

options.text: We'll close the path, and go home together.
Turbak-san, you'll continue to be a hero.

name: Turbak
text:
Ahaha, thank you.
I've always... wanted to be
selfish like this just once.

name: Turbak
text:
You're a really good person.
I'm glad you were the one to join me
in my first and last time being a bad boy!

[Player] hurriedly reaches out their hand.
Brushing that hand aside, Turbak's figure
sinks into the darkness of memory.
—At that moment.

name: Turbak
text:
...!?
What is this, fireworks...?

Colorful lights fill the empty
space, completely painting it.
And—

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Wooooooh!!
Hold it right there!!

With the colorful lights at his back,
a single shadow tears through the darkness
of memory and leaps in.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Alright!!
Turbak-san, secured~!
Now, you're going to behave~!!

name: Turbak
text:
E... Ehh!?
W-Wait a minute, Barrel-kun!
I get it, I get it!!

Grabbing Turbak's arm, who had brushed
off [Player]'s hand, Barrel restrains
his movements with all his might.

name: Turbak
text:
Why are you here too?
And, how in the world...

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
The black thing covering those people disappeared~.
And then, you two collapsed,
and after that, suddenly—

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
The black thing came out again, and
this time it was heading for you,
Turbak-san, so I rushed to protect you~.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
And when I got close to Turbak-san,
I heard your voices from the thread
connecting you two, so—

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I wanted to join the conversation too!
...I put my spirit into it, and
somehow I was here~!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
...Turbak-san, I'm sorry~.
On the way here, I heard
what you two were talking about~.

At Barrel's words,
Turbak stops moving
and quietly looks down.

name: Turbak
text:
...I see, you heard me too.
Well, it's fine, you understand
my feelings, so leave me alone.

options.text: There's no way I can leave you alone!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Just as [Player]-san says,
there's no way I can leave you alone~.
We're going back together, Turbak-san.

name: Turbak
text:
What's the point of going back?
Am I supposed to deceive myself by being
a 'good boy', a 'hero', and keep living a lie?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
...Turbak-san, you're very kind~.
And you're also a good, proper person~.

Smiling gently, Barrel
hugs Turbak, and pats
his back at the same rhythm.
oh can someone end me

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
The people of your hometown are right,
they were just trying to be happy
on their own, right~?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Your father is right too~!
He was trying to protect the festival
for the residents until the very end~!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
And, Turbak-san, more than anyone,
you are a kind, good and proper person~!
You're the coolest~!!

name: Turbak
text:
.........
...What's that about?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Turbak-san, for the people of your hometown,
and your own father, you were doing
your best with them in mind, right~?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Nobody is at fault~!
So in that case—

Barrel smiles broadly,
and passes on the 'cool' he once
received to Turbak.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Turbak-san, you can do whatever you want,
follow it through, and laugh with all your might!
That's what being cool's all about~!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
And, Turbak-san, if you
are worried, are suffering...
And becomes a bad boy—

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I'll stop you no matter how many times it takes~!
After all, I'm a police officer
of justice, and a hero~!!

options.text: ...It's okay, even if it's a lie.
Lies, selfishness, all of it is a part of you.
So, let us share them with you.

name: Turbak
text:
.........
...Ahaha, what's that all about?

name: Turbak
text:
If I can be honest,
I think it's because
you two have acknowledged me.

name: Turbak
text:
...But, more than that.
Your words make me really happy
from the bottom of my heart.

As Turbak says, he turns his face
away and looks downwards. From his
eyes, several drops trickled down.

name: Turbak
text:
...Lend me your hands, you two.
Right now, I and the Imposter Villain are
connected through the Parallel Weapon.

name: Turbak
text:
I'm going to break that connection now.
And, before this Parallel Weapon
connects to the attackers again—

name: Turbak
text:
[Player]-kun, I need you
to close the path.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I'll definitely protect you
no matter what, so [Player]-san,
please focus on the path~!!

options.text: Let's go back, to the festival!

text:
[Player] nods firmly.
And, as if to push the group's backs,
colorful lights illuminate the darkness again.

[Player] focuses, and closes the last path.
At that moment, the group's vision blurs—

Like awaking from a lucid dream,
their own senses become vague.
And at that moment, their consciousness fades.

name: Turbak
text:
...I'll take it with me.
Even if it's forgotten, even if it disappears.
I'll always remember it.

Turbak's whispering voice disappeared
along with the space of memory.

Finale:
After the Carnival

...[Player]!
[Player]!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
[Player]!
You're awake!
Hah... Thank goodness...

[Player] opens their eyes.
In their vision, Roudin's
worried face shows up.

options.text: I could see the fireworks, properly.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin (Stella Link)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You, is that the first thing you decide to say!?
Well... Thanks.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
You seem to be fully conscious.
The black thing on the Imposter Villain is gone,
so... You've really done well.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Oh, looks like the others are waking up too.
Welcome back, heroes!

In Roudin's line of sight,
Barrel and Turbak are
slowly sitting up.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
OK, OK, all OK!!
This-officer-is-back~!!
Are you two okay, any injuries~!?

name: Turbak
text:
...Yeah, I'm fine.
I suppose, it's all over now.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
For now, I'm just glad
you're all safe.
Now, for the status report.

After confirming that no one had any
obvious external injuries, Roudin explains
the situation with a relieved smile.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
The Imposter Villain collapsed,
and its Parallel Weapon
enveloped you guys, but—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
That also disappeared soon after.
Our 'Observer' confirmed
that the path closed.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
The attackers are all restrained
and handed over to the local police.
And—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
The stage was a huge success!
It's closing time now, so the heroes are
guiding the guests to the exit.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
No casualties.
The Imposter Villain left
the stage right away.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Fortina Pavilion's
attractions were only
slightly damaged.

name: Turbak
text:
...I see.
That's really a relief.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
I'd like to hear your story,
but that's all for today.
Let's continue this tomorrow, okay?

options.text: Is there anything I can help with?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Me too~!
I'm still full of energy~!
I'll help with anything~!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Oh, that's a good attitude.
In that case, your job is...
To get a detailed examination right now.

name: Turbak
text:
Ehh!?
Wait a minute, Roudin-san,
we're still fine...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
No buts, resting your body
is also an important job.
I won't take no for an answer, okay?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
What, from tomorrow on,
you'll be busier than ever.
Be prepared to be worked to the bone, okay?

Urged on by Roudin, who said with a laugh,
they went to the arranged lunar hospital
for a detailed examination.

Perhaps from the exhaustion of the turbulent day,
the moment they got into the hotel bed,
they lost consciousness, and the next morning came.

name: Barrel
text:
Good morning~!
Another great day for a festival... Wait,
I can't get used to that sky being a projection~.

name: Turbak
text:
Good morning.
Um, yesterday I caused
everyone a lot of trouble...

options.text: You don't have to apologize, Turbak-san.
We were able to resolve it safely!

name: Barrel
text:
Just as [Player]-san says~!
It's all resolved, so it's all good,
and all is okay~!

name: Turbak
text:
Thank you, you two.
I—

Turbak, with a serious expression at
[Player] and Barrel's words.
Interrupting him, a voice calls from behind.

name: Roudin
text:
Yo, good morning!
I'd like to hear what happened
in that battle, but—

name: Roudin
text:
First, let me explain the aftermath.
...Well, you all look ready for it.

Roudin operates the device in his hand,
and in front of him, the figures of people
they've gotten to know over the past few days are displayed.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
You must have worked hard, everyone.
From the looks of it, it looks like my
worries for your health were unnecessary.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Yes, I'm truly glad as well.
But, please don't overdo it?
If you feel unwell, please contact the first aid room.

options.text: I'm sorry to have worried you...

text:
Returning a smile at [Player]'s words,
Nessen continues speaking.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
...Now then, I hear from Roudin-sama
that the explanation of what happened
after is yet to come, so I shall start.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Thanks to all of your efforts,
we have restrained the attackers.
They've already been handed over to the local police.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
...Also, separate from the perpetrators,
the person who was giving instructions to
the attackers has been arrested in Fortina.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
The requests for guerrilla live
shows that were sent to
Clouge and Wehmalt's pavilions—

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
They were sent from a Fortina government
ID, so we proceeded with the investigation
at the same time as the attack.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
We managed to identify the culprit during our response
to the attackers. They were arrested by the Fortina government
and are currently being transported to the moon.

options.text: I guess they never intended to escape.

name: Roudin
text:
You might be right.
...Well, seeing that post and the
rampage, I can kind of get it.

name: Turbak
text:
...Yes, those people no longer had
control over their own future.

name: Turbak
text:
They just wanted someone to notice.
They were screaming that they were here,
that they wanted someone to see them.

name: Turbak
text:
I'm not trying to defend them...
But I hope that someday, they'll properly
atone for their sins, and face those feelings.

name: Barrel
text:
Yeah~... And if they stray from the
path again, we police will stop them,
no matter how many times it takes~!

Barrel's voice shatters the
heavy silence, and Nessen smiles
at the scene and continues.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
I sincerely hope that
your feelings reach them.
Now, about the GCE event.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
The only damage from yesterday's
attack was some partial damage to
Fortina Pavilion's facilities.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Just in case, we conducted inspections
at all pavilions after closing yesterday,
and confirmed that there were no problems.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Thanks to the efforts of the staff who
worked through the night, we were able
to open on schedule today as well.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
...And, about the exhibition at the
Fortina Pavilion, which was the
center of this commotion—

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
It has been decided that the exhibition will continue.
—However, as for the guerrilla live shows,
we have imposed some restrictions.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Specifically, the live show schedule and the
performing staff must be approved in advance, and live
shows outside the designated areas are prohibited.

options.text: I'm glad there was a good compromise.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
It's all thanks to your efforts.
As the organizer's proxy, and as
a participant, I am truly grateful.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
If you have time, please visit our
pavilion again. Everyone there
would like to thank you as well.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Oops!
It's almost opening time.
Please contact us if anything comes up.

The call ends with Nessen's words.
And, waiting for that, a voice
calls out from behind the group.

name: Sensettia
text:
You don't seem to be injured!
I came to check on you before we open!

name: Viscunam
text:
The pavilion is fully restored!
You should all come again, because I'll
show you a new frontier of amusement parks!

name: Theoreol
text:
If you feel unwell, please let me knOW.
I have created a new formulA...
No, I'll treat you to a new driNK!

name: Sensettia
text:
...Theoreol, you're not actually
giving that to our guests, are you?
Honestly, all of you people...!

options.text: I'm glad you're all doing well.
Please obey the laws and ethics...

name: Sensettia
text:
Ah... It's all thanks to you guys.
I'm really grateful of you.
To be honest, I had given up.

name: Viscunam
text:
However, I still don't get the stage appearance!
What do you mean, 'the stage was fun'!?
I am a scientist first and foremost...

name: Theoreol
text:
What's wrong with it, Viscunam?
Even if I was exposed to the public eye,
the reaction wasn't as negative as I expecteD.

name: Theoreol
text:
As I thought, people's values
do change over tiME.
This was some very meaningful researCH!

name: Sensettia
text:
Well, a lot happened, but.
We and the Nethers are planning
to participate until the end.

name: Sensettia
text:
You guys went to the trouble of
protecting us, so we'll make this
the most exciting pavilion!

Sensettia and the others smile as they say that.
The group also smiles back at their words.

name: Barrel
text:
Oh, a declaration of war~!
We won't lose, because the most
exciting pavilion is Japan Pavilion~!!

name: Viscunam
text:
Kukuku, you talk big!
We'll see if you can keep
that same face until GCE closes!

name: Sensettia
text:
That's right, we won't lose, alright?
Well then, we'll be heading
back to our pavilion.

Leaving smiles behind, Sensettia and the others
turn their backs to the group and walk away.
And...

name: Roudin
text:
Well!
We've got work to do today too!
...But, before that.

options.text: I'm sorry for interrupting you earlier.

name: Turbak
text:
Ah, don't worry about it!
I wanted to apologize for the trouble I caused
yesterday... And ask you to hear my answer.

name: Roudin
text:
...Hey, Turbak, about that.
What happened in the battle with the
attackers? Can you tell me about it?

name: Turbak
text:
Of course.
Roudin-san, you've helped me too,
so I'd like you to hear it.

At Roudin's words,
Turbak quietly recounts his
experience in the memory.

name: Turbak
text:
...And that's what happened.
Thank you, Roudin-san, we were able to
see your fireworks clearly in there too!

name: Roudin
text:
...I see.
If it managed to reach you guys too,
then it must have been the best stage ever.

name: Turbak
text:
So, I thought about it all night.
About what Barrel-kun has told me, that what
kind of person do I need to be in order to smile?

name: Barrel
text:
...And so.
Did you find an answer~?

name: Turbak
text:
That's the thing, I didn't get it at all!
In my entire life, I've never
once thought about my ideal self!

name: Turbak
text:
...So.
I'll keep on thinking about it,
while sharing all sorts of feelings.

options.text: You're not... forcing yourself, are you?

name: Roudin
text:
You don't have to force yourself, you know?
If you're putting up with it,
or if it's painful to you...

name: Turbak
text:
I'm really not forcing myself.
...You know, I've always thought
that I had to be a good boy.

name: Turbak
text:
To fulfill everyone's happiness, what can I do
for them, what do I have to do for them?
That's everything I've ever thought about.

name: Turbak
text:
I've always hated that about myself.
...But yesterday, I thought about
my life up until now again.

At Roudin's words,
Turbak looks down and continues to
speak, savoring each word carefully.

I think they've misspelled Roudin (ルーディン) to routine (ルーティン),
so I'll take it that it says Roudin here

name: Turbak
text:
Even the me from before, was only
acting for someone else's happiness.
I realized that only that much is true.

name: Turbak
text:
Studying the local festivals and customs,
and passing on people's feelings to someone else.
...That's all the things I've been doing up until now.

name: Turbak
text:
I really liked it, it was fun.
Therefore, from now on—

name: Turbak
text:
As much as other people's happiness,
shouldn't I consider my own happiness too?
That's what I'll try to think about!

options.text: Let me think about it with you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-kun... Thank you.
If you'd like, I'd be happy if you could lend me an ear, even if it's just sometimes.

name: Barrel
text:
That's great~!
I'll be cheering for you
all the way~, Turbak-san!!

name: Roudin
text:
Well, I still think you
could relax a little more.
...Oh, right, Turbak.

As Roudin says, he flashes
a mischievous look and
smiles at Turbak.

name: Roudin
text:
You want to discover all sorts
of different sides of yourself, right?
In that case—

name: Roudin
text:
How about practicing your insults?
Here, try saying something,
I'll take it just fine, okay?

name: Turbak
text:
Ehh!?
It's so sudden that I'm at a loss!
And then, to you, Roudin-san...

name: Roudin
text:
It's just a little test.
Come on, come on.

name: Turbak
text:
Uhh... Ummm.
M-May you be just a
little bit unhappy!!

name: Turbak
text:
...No.
Waaah, I'm sorry!!
I want you to be twice as happy!!

name: Turbak
text:
As expected, this is
too hard to do so suddenly.
Uu, how embarrassing.

name: Roudin
text:
Hahaha!
Sorry for forcing you,
I just wanted you to relax a little.

name: Barrel
text:
You've only just started thinking about it~.
Let's do our best together,
Turbak-san~!

name: Turbak
text:
Ah... You're right.
There's a lot to think about, but I'll try
to move forward in my own way.

At Turbak's words, a warm
laughter spreads through the group.
And—

name: Turbak
text:
Well then, once again!
I will confirm today's work!

name: Turbak
text:
There's an exchange stream scheduled for today.
Our partner will be... Planet Dynast's
Maharajan Chocolat Festival.

name: Turbak
text:
I'll explain the
details on the way.
Well then, shall we go?

name: Turbak
text:
To deliver the best
happiness to all our guests!

The group starts walking, led by Turbak.
Behind them, the clamor of the
Japan Pavilion's festival stalls envelops them.

Live A Hero! Special Edition
"Stella Link Carnival"
— END
